column5: I captured this the other night,  but ran out of memory card.  At least you can get an idea of his presentation.  http://video.google.ca/videoplay?docid=-26...h&plindex=0

I also had the pleasure of meeting al,and having a 10min conversation with him..and i think he is very genuine,and knows his fishing thats for sure,im glad they got him to come to the show.i also watched his seminar on saturday morn,it was cool..... i also asked him, to sign my OFC hat,and he said sure and that he had heard of the site too !!!! i always try to watch his new show called the angling / edge...cheers
Al's the Man! I learnt more from Inn-Fish as a young angler than anywhere! He's a multi-specie master and it was great to meet him.

I watched the Linders show this morning on WFN and to me he's still the best.  When we had the video store I brought in all the In Fisherman tapes of different species for rental.  I learned more from those tapes and on occasion still look at them.  I was sad when they sold the magazine a few years back...what a fountain of information.
